title: Apple settles long-running patent dispute over iPhone LTE tech
content:
As reported by Reuters, Apple and patent-licensing company WiLAN have signed a new license agreement. Concerning wireless technology, the companies have had patent disputes for years and finally reached an agreement. 

more…

The post Apple settles long-running patent dispute over iPhone LTE tech appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: As reported by Reuters, Apple and patent-licensing company WiLAN have settled a long-running dispute and signed a new license agreement.
